mapper.insert: insert into basic_purviewrole (pkid, name, sortnum, status, createtime, remark, modulepurviews, menupurviews,itempurviews) values (#{pkid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sortnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{modulepurviews,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{menupurviews,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{itempurviews,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update basic_purviewrole set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sortnum = #{sortnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, modulepurviews = #{modulepurviews,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, menupurviews = #{menupurviews,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, itempurviews = #{itempurviews,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where pkid = #{pkid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select pkid, name, sortnum, status, createtime, remark, modulepurviews, menupurviews,itempurviews from basic_purviewrole
